item.name: Configuration Set Migration

request.description: Check status of an export process.

response.name: Configuration Set status retrieved (in progress states).

request.description: Start a CSM archive export process.
Apply a migration set that has been successfully imported.
Check status of a CSM archive import process.

response.name: Configuration Set status retrieved (in progress states).

request.description: Start a CSM archive import process.
Rollback a migration set that has been applied successfully.
Retrieve a list of completed delta migration sets on the environment.

response.name: List of delta migration sets retrieved.

request.description: Get the currently applicable migration mode.
Retrieve a list of optional modules.

item.description: The export resource is used for initiating CSM export in the source environment.
